sentences.sContent: Design travelers will dig the big, bulbous lamps that hang from the ceiling over leather seats and carefully-placed table settings.
sentences.sContent_eng: Design travelers will dig the big, bulbous lamps that hang from the ceiling over leather seats and carefully-placed table settings.
sentences.sCn: 这些设计使得游客会欣赏那些大大的从天花板垂下并悬于皮椅之上的球根状灯饰和精心设计的餐桌摆设。

remMethod.val: 来自bulb (n. 鳞茎， 球形物)

words.tran: 生球茎；膨胀成球状（bulb的过去分词形式）

trans.tranCn: 球根的， 球根状的， 球根长成的
